--- In nbwrpg@y..., "warriorazure" <wingedwarrior41@h...> wrote:
> Blackfang advanced. He soon entered a hot, humid and marshy jungle. 
He 
> had a lot of difficulty to walk, but kept on going.
>

the 
> right way. Let's continue, and be on your guards!
